short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve usability of canny.io for end-users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds following features to canny.io by Canny Inc.

- Show author name and date of each post
- Mark your own posts
- Mark posts by author names
- Visibility filter for posts


Warnings and Limitations:
- This extension is not affiliated with Canny Inc.
- Do not confuse with "Canny Chrome Extension" by Canny Inc.
